includedAssets.title: Mayhem
includedAssets.synopsis: An SUV carrying members of the BAU explodes, leaving the others to catch the terrorists as the injured agents fight for their lives.

includedAssets.title: The Angel Maker
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU must find the link between a series of murders and their apparent connection to a killer executed the previous year.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU must find the link between a series of murders and their apparent connection to a killer executed the previous year.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU must find the link between a series of murders and their apparent connection to a killer executed the previous year.

includedAssets.title: Minimal Loss
includedAssets.synopsis: Prentiss and Reid get trapped underground amid a disturbing cult after an undercover operation takes an unexpected turn.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Prentiss and Reid get trapped underground amid a disturbing cult after an undercover operation takes an unexpected turn.

includedAssets.title: Paradise
includedAssets.synopsis: The team go in search of a killer who disguises his deeds by making it look like the victims were killed in a car accident.

includedAssets.title: Catching Out

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A case involving the kidnapping of a young boy triggers a series of dreams that may help Dr Reid reveal some buried childhood memories...

includedAssets.title: Memoriam
includedAssets.synopsis: Dr Reid takes it upon himself to investigate an old case involving the murder of a young boy that he feels is somehow connected to his own childhood.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Dr Reid takes it upon himself to investigate an old case involving the murder of a young boy that he feels is somehow connected to his own childhood.

includedAssets.title: Masterpiece
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU profile a serial killer who has turned himself in, but refuses to give the team any information on his latest victims.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU profile a serial killer who has turned himself in, but refuses to give the team any information on his latest victims.

includedAssets.title: 52 Pick
includedAssets.synopsis: Agents Prentiss and Todd go undercover to profile a pickup artist who uses his skills of persuasion to lure women into danger.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Agents Prentiss and Todd go undercover to profile a pickup artist who uses his skills of persuasion to lure women into danger.

includedAssets.title: Brothers in Arms
includedAssets.synopsis: Ex-cop Morgan has a tough time when the BAU investigate a killer specifically targeting members of the police force in Phoenix, Arizona.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ex-cop Morgan has a tough time when the BAU investigate a killer specifically targeting members of the police force in Phoenix, Arizona.

includedAssets.title: Normal
includedAssets.synopsis: The team investigates a serial killer dubbed "The Road Warrior", a suspect who kills luxury car owners while they are driving on freeways in Southern California.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team investigates a serial killer dubbed "The Road Warrior", a suspect who kills luxury car owners while they are driving on freeways in Southern California.

includedAssets.title: Soul Mates
includedAssets.synopsis: When a young woman disappears from a well-off community in Florida, the BAU find that evidence points towards the partner of a pair of serial killers.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When a young woman disappears from a well-off community in Florida, the BAU find that evidence points towards the partner of a pair of serial killers.

includedAssets.title: Bloodline
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU are called out to Alabama when a series of abductions all point to what appears to be a criminal family working together.

includedAssets.title: Cold Comfort
includedAssets.synopsis: The mother of an abducted child works with the BAU in Seattle to identify a serial killer who kidnaps, murders, and embalms his victims.

includedAssets.title: Pleasure Is My Business
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep16 - Pleasure Is My Business
includedAssets.synopsis: The team searches for a female suspect who uses her professional skills as a high class call girl to lure and kill high-powered executives.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team searches for a female suspect who uses her professional skills as a high class call girl to lure and kill high-powered executives.

includedAssets.synopsis: When the BAU investigate a series of exorcisms that appear to have been sanctioned by the Vatican, Prentiss finds herself personally involved in the case.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When the BAU investigate a series of exorcisms that appear to have been sanctioned by the Vatican, Prentiss finds herself personally involved in the case.

includedAssets.title: Omnivore

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: One of Hotchner's first cases rears its head again when the notorious serial killer involved returns to Boston after 10 years.

includedAssets.title: Conflicted
includedAssets.synopsis: The team travels to South Padre Island during spring break to find a serial killer who is targeting college students on vacation.

includedAssets.title: A Shade of Grey
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep21 - A Shade of Grey
includedAssets.synopsis: Drama following the FBI's Behavioural Analysis Unit. The team discovers that one of their cases may not be the handiwork of the serial killer they apprehended.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team discovers that one of their cases may not be the handiwork of the serial killer they apprehended.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Drama following the FBI's Behavioural Analysis Unit. The team discovers that one of their cases may not be the handiwork of the serial killer they apprehended.

includedAssets.title: The Big Wheel
includedAssets.synopsis: A videotape from a serial killer detailing one of his crimes carries a hidden message asking for help to stop his murderous ways.

includedAssets.title: Roadkill
includedAssets.synopsis: Local authorities summon the assistance of the BAU after a series of homicides occur that appear to have been caused by a serial killer's car near Bend, Oregon.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Local authorities summon the assistance of the BAU after a series of homicides occur that appear to have been caused by a serial killer's car near Bend, Oregon.

includedAssets.title: Amplification
includedAssets.synopsis: When a new type of chemical warfare is released, the BAU must act quickly to find the source before any more innocent people are exposed.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When a new type of chemical warfare is released, the BAU must act quickly to find the source before any more innocent people are exposed.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When a new type of chemical warfare is released, the BAU must act quickly to find the source before any more innocent people are exposed.

includedAssets.title: To Hell...
includedAssets.synopsis: In one of its most difficult cases, the BAU is called to Detroit to help track down a serial killer who forces the team into Canada to catch him.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In one of its most difficult cases, the BAU is called to Detroit to help track down a serial killer who forces the team into Canada to catch him.

includedAssets.title: ...And Back
includedAssets.synopsis: The team track a killer who targets junkies, prostitutes and the homeless and takes them across the Canadian Border. An old enemy also returns.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team track a killer who targets junkies, prostitutes and the homeless and takes them across the Canadian Border. An old enemy also returns.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: In this fourth season of the dark crime drama, the BAU deal with the fallout of the terrorist attack, but realise they may be part of a much bigger plot. Joe Mantegna, Paget Brewster, Matthew Gray Gubler and Thomas Gibson star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Season four of the dark crime drama. The BAU deal with the fallout of the attack, but realise they may be part of a bigger plot. Joe Mantegna stars.

includedIn.title: Criminal Minds
includedIn.synopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, an elite group of psychological profilers, travel the country aiding local law enforcement by getting inside the heads of murder suspects.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, a team of elite psychological profilers, travel America aiding local police by getting inside suspects’ heads.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, an elite group of psychological profilers, travel the country aiding local law enforcement by getting inside the heads of murder suspects.
